title: Beauty Makeup Editor: Selfie Camera, Photo Editor
description:
Beauty Makeup editor is the best free app to retouch your selfies by applying makeup also it is a photo editor, and beauty camera. Just in seconds, you can face tune your sweet selfies, edit photos from your photo gallery, combine your photos with the collage maker and take beautiful selfies using the beauty camera filters and effects. Makeup photo editor provides you all the features you need to face tune and retouch your selfie and to get a perfect face. When you are done with the face tuning use the insta resize tool to crop your selfies and adjust for the social media. Share your sweet selfies on Instagram, Facebook, Tik Tok, Snapchat, and VK.
Beauty Makeup Editor:
Retouch your selfies with the beauty makeup editor! Now you don’t need to put makeup on just to take photos :) . Instead, instantly apply virtual makeup to your selfies as you wish. First select your favorite selfie to retouch then you can either choose to apply makeup from the auto retouch section where you can find dozens of full makeup or customize your very own makeup:
-Beautify Your Eyes:
With one click change your eye color, brighten and enlarge your eyes, remove your eyebags and beautify your eyes by wearing an eyeliner
-Skin Smoothener:
Face tune with the smoothener brush. Explore the foundation effect, soften your skin and have a smooth face in seconds
- Teeth Whitener:
Get rid of the yellow teeth and have the brightest smile with white teeth.
-Customized Makeup:
Retouch your selfies with best makeup products. Decide on the color of your lipstick and find the right contour for your face. To have more attractive selfies use mascara and have bambi eyes.
-Acne Remover:
Remove acne and get rid of all the skin problems like pimples and blackhead to glam your selfies.
-Lip Shaper:
Fine tune your lips and enlarge it to have a perfect face. Put on your favourite lipstick either in matte color or shiny color.
Professional Photo Editor
Retouch your selfies with a professional touch to glam and to have perfect face! Add marvellous sketch in dozens of colors, borders, add text in many fonts and sizes, even change the background :). Finally adjust the brightness, saturation, and contrast to make your photo perfect. With all this face tune features, it is inevitable to not have many flawless selfies. collage maker combines all your favorite photos in one post. This is the best and the most comprehensive photo editor and face tune app ever.
Beauty Camera with Filters and Effects
Take your photos directly with the selfie camera to bring some fun to your sweet selfies. The beauty camera slims your face, face tune it and smoothen it instantly, comes with a plethora of funny filters and effects. Take selfie famous dog face, cat face, rabbit face, and an angel filter. Take many funny videos and photos with the filters provided by the beauty camera. All the filters and effects are free and we regularly update the photo editor and selfie camera to add even more filters. The beauty camera effects and filters can be used both with your front camera and back camera :).. Nowadays selfie camera filters and effects are so trendy. Share your funny selfies with your friends on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, Snapchat, and VK.
This beauty app is an all in one photo editing app, coming up with the face tune & beauty makeup editor for retouch, photo editor, and a beauty selfie camera. With the makeup tool, you can try a plethora of beauty makeup styles that are so hard to put on in real life. Also, you’ll love taking photos with the selfie camera using the filters and effects. It is the best photo & beauty makeup editor and selfie camera ever, download it now!
